thread.title: Nashville Is Back! The Best Western-Inspired Looks to Ride Out Season 5
thread.title_full: Nashville Is Back! The Best Western-Inspired Looks to Ride Out Season 5

author: Maria Ward, Chelsea Zalopany
title: Nashville Is Back! The Best Western-Inspired Looks to Ride Out Season 5
text:
Photo: (Clockwise from top left) Courtesy of garmentory.com; Courtesy of luisaviaroma.com See more photos of: 
Tonight, we’re tipping our hats to Nashville fans. When ABC pulled the plug on the series just days before the season four finale (which ended in a major cliff hanger surrounding Hayden Panettiere’s character, Juliette Barnes), the move was met with a chorus of distaste from viewers who took to social media in response. They could have just as easily wallowed to the tune of some sad country soundtrack. Now the show has a new home at CMT and (yes!) the season five two-hour premiere is set [the first ep was already released] for tonight at 9:00 p.m. 
It wouldn’t be a happy ending without an honorary wardrobe reboot to ride out the next chapter in style. Here to help you get back in the saddle is Vogue.com Market Editor Chelsea Zalopany who has curated inspired options to last you the 22-episode season and beyond. “Basically, I have been loving the Dolly Parton look,” Zalopany admits, “but I’m also fascinated by the super-high-end designers doing country-luxe.” In other words, the all-American attire found here will feel right at home with fashion’s updated Western mood, no matter what fate has in store for Juliette and the rest of our friends from Nashville .
